entry.string: You must enable cookies on your browser to run Xaraya. Check the browser configuration options to make sure cookies are enabled, click on the "Back" button of the browser and try again.
Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
entry.translation: A sua conta foi bloqueada por #(1) minutos.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password.
Your account has been terminated by your request or at the adminstrator's discression.
entry.translation: A sua conta foi cancelada conforme o seu pedido ou por decisão do administrador.

entry.string: Your account has been marked as inactive. Contact the adminstrator with further questions.
Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. You have tried to log in #(1) times.
Your account has not yet been activated by the site administrator
entry.translation: A sua conta ainda não foi aprovada pelo administrador
